name: GREEK ASSOCIATION OF FOOD SUPPLEMENTS' ENTERPREUNERS
membership: SESDI is a member of the European Federation of Associations of Health Product Manufacturers (EHPM)
goal:
SESDI was created back in 1992, as the Greek Food Supplements Association, representing the majority of Greek companies that are active in the field.

SESDI aims to promote awareness of the role of food supplements in nutrition and well-being and to encourage self compliance of the sector in Greece.

Our goal is also to encourage the participation of manufacturing and trading companies in the decision and policy making processes ensuring a fair regulatory framework for this category of products.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Food Safety, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade
